name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE, Appellant, v. DIVINE PROVIDENCE HOSPITAL, Appellee

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE, Appellant, v. DIVINE PROVIDENCE HOSPITAL, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
This appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
ZAPPALA, J., notes a dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Bruce G. Baron, Asst. Counsel, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Richard A. Vanderlin, O. William Vanderlin, Williamsport, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
544 A.2d 1323
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE, Appellant, v. DIVINE PROVIDENCE HOSPITAL, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted May 9, 1988.
Decided Aug. 10, 1988.
Bruce G. Baron, Asst. Counsel, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Richard A. Vanderlin, O. William Vanderlin, Williamsport, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
